GEN800.name: Genetics Seminar
GEN800.semester: Fall of every year, Spring of every year, Summer of every year
GEN800.description: Critical analysis of current literature. Student presentations.

GEN810.name: Theory and Practice of Teaching Genetics
GEN810.semester: Fall of every year, Spring of every year, Summer of every year
GEN810.description: Techniques and challenges in teaching microbial, molecular, or human genetics at the college level.
GEN810.restrictions: Open to graduate students in the College of Natural Science.

GEN835.name: Eukaryotic Molecular Genetics
GEN835.description: Gene structure and function in animals, plants, and fungi. Basic aspects of modern human genetics and the genetic basis for disease. Molecular genetic analyses. Eukaryotic modeling systems.
GEN835.restrictions: Open only to graduate students in the colleges of Agriculture and Natural Resources, Engineering, Human Medicine, Natural Science, Osteopathic Medicine, and Veterinary Medicine.

GEN840.name: Genetics Writing Skills
GEN840.semester: Fall of every year, Spring of every year, Summer of every year
GEN840.description: Development of a genetics research proposal
GEN840.restrictions: Open to graduate students in the Genetics major. Approval of department.

GEN851.name: Insect Physiology and Molecular Biology
GEN851.description: Structure and function of physiological systems in insects, and current understanding of how these systems work at the molecular level.

GEN880.name: Laboratory Rotation
GEN880.semester: Fall of every year, Spring of every year, Summer of every year
GEN880.description: Participation in research with faculty members.
GEN880.restrictions: Open to doctoral students in the Genetics major.

GEN890.name: Independent Study
GEN890.semester: Fall of every year, Spring of every year, Summer of every year
GEN890.description: Non-thesis research for Plan B master's students
GEN890.restrictions: Open to graduate students in the Genetics major or approval of department.

GEN891.name: Selected Topics in Genetics
GEN891.semester: Fall of every year, Spring of every year, Summer of every year
GEN891.description: Genetics topics, trends, or issues of current interest.

GEN899.name: Master's Thesis Research
GEN899.semester: Fall of every year, Spring of every year, Summer of every year

GEN999.name: Doctoral Dissertation Research
GEN999.semester: Fall of every year, Spring of every year, Summer of every year
GEN999.restrictions: Open to doctoral students in the Genetics major.
